results.title: [Local application of simvastatin to rat incisor sockets augments bone].
results.text_hl: The purpose of the present study was to examine how local application of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, one of the statins, to the @<m>DISEASE_Hip_socket_neuropathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C531783 @@@tooth socket@@@ after @DISEASE_Tooth_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D014076 @@@tooth extraction@@@ affects alveolar bone.

citations.NLM: Nishimura K. [Local application of simvastatin to rat incisor sockets augments bone]. Kokubyo Gakkai Zasshi. 2008 Mar;75(1):49-54. PMID: 18421951
citations.BibTeX: @article{18421951, title={[Local application of simvastatin to rat incisor sockets augments bone].}, author={Nishimura K}, journal={Kokubyo Gakkai Zasshi}, volume={75}, number={1}, pages={49-54}}

results.title: [Effect of simvastatin on residual ridge resorption after tooth extraction].
results.journal: Zhonghua Kou Qiang Yi Xue Za Zhi
results.text_hl: Light microscopy showed that bone formation rate and quality of the experimental group were better than those in the control group at the same time. CONCLUSIONS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ carried by @CHEMICAL_Polylactic_Acid_Polyglycolic_Acid_Copolymer @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077182 @@@PLGA@@@ could induce bone formation of @<m>DISEASE_Hip_socket_neuropathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C531783 @@@tooth socket@@@.

citations.NLM: Wu Z, Sun HC, Liu ST, Wang Y. [Effect of simvastatin on residual ridge resorption after tooth extraction]. Zhonghua Kou Qiang Yi Xue Za Zhi. 2006 Dec;41(12):747-50. PMID: 17349198
citations.BibTeX: @article{17349198, title={[Effect of simvastatin on residual ridge resorption after tooth extraction].}, author={Wu Z and Sun HC and Liu ST and Wang Y}, journal={Zhonghua Kou Qiang Yi Xue Za Zhi}, volume={41}, number={12}, pages={747-50}}

results.title: Enhanced osteogenic healing process of rat tooth sockets using a novel simvastatin-loaded injectable microsphere-hydrogel system.
results.text_hl: A @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ @DISEASE_Tooth_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D014076 @@@tooth extraction@@@ socket model was generated, and the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-loaded microsphere-hydrogel composite was injected in the defect area of a @<m>DISEASE_Hip_socket_neuropathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C531783 @@@tooth socket@@@.

citations.NLM: Li X, Liu X, Ni S, Liu Y, Sun H, Lin Q. Enhanced osteogenic healing process of rat tooth sockets using a novel simvastatin-loaded injectable microsphere-hydrogel system. J Craniomaxillofac Surg. 2019 Jul;47(7):1147-1154. PMID: 31078372
